title: The 'Melania Tapes' Could Backfire for the Media | 10/2/20
description:
President Trump and the first lady have tested positive for COVID-19 hours after aide Hope Hicks tested positive. In a new low for the media, CNN released the “Melania tapes” and disgustingly spun her statements on Christmas and children at the border. But is their attack boosting support for Melania? Glenn opens up the phone lines to hear from listeners about what they’re seeing in their own lives. A new poll found a majority of Americans believe a civil war is brewing. Will the mark of the beast not be a physical mark? Dr. Richard Bartlett joins to discuss the latest coronavirus treatments. The former CEO of Twitter tweeted “me-first capitalists” will be the first people “shot in the revolution” without any pushback from Twitter.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
